eventDes: International Women's Day (IWD) is marked on March 8th every year. In different regions, the focus of celebrations ranges from general respect and appreciation for women to a celebration of women's economic, political, and social achievements.
aboutWTMProgram: Women Techmakers is a program created by Google to celebrate International Women's Day and to highlight the talent of women in technology. In 2019, we’re organizing the fourth edition in Montreal as part of the special event The Women Techmakers Global Event Series Celebrating International Women’s Day (WTM IWD).

stats.name: Sessions
stats.des: 3 parallel tracks, dedicated to Android, Web and Cloud technologies

stats.name: Showcases
stats.des: Demo zone with the latest of Google tech: Actions by Women in tech all in one place

stats.name: Networking
stats.des: Work hard and enjoy IWD19 is the best place to meet new people

stats.name: Workshop
stats.des: 2 workshops to get your hands dirty and create a working prototype right during the conference
